name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V

reviews.name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V
reviews.reviewText: It's been two month we bought this dryer. This one is a gas dryer and can dry a large load of clothes in only 30 mint. So this one is surely an energy saving product. I would recommend this one.
reviews.title: Energy saving

reviews.name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V
reviews.reviewText: This Dryer does everything it is suppose to do. Still Learning about all of the Features. Using the basic the Dryer performs very well. Cannot imagine that once I learn about all of the Features and how to use them it will be even better.
reviews.title: So Far, I love it.

reviews.name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V
reviews.reviewText: Great features and works quickly especially when using the matching washer. Dries in about ½ the time of our ol dryer. A bit expensive. Super easy to use.
reviews.title: Excellent dryer

reviews.name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V
reviews.reviewText: Great dryer, east to use and does a capable great results.
reviews.title: Efficient

reviews.name: LG 27" Front-Load Gas Dryer with 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity, 12 Dry Cycles DLGX3571V
reviews.reviewText: Like the quality, design and features. It is a bit pricey but worth the investment.
reviews.title: Quality product…so far
